name: Wererat
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wererat makes three Claw or Shortsword attacks, or it makes three Hand Crossbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack, provided it is in the appropriate form.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or be cursed with the wererat lycanthropy curse (see Curse of Lycanthropy sidebar).

actions.name: Claw (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wererat's Perception is 17 when perceiving by smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wererat has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wererat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
